name: Pumpkin Game (Legacy)
description:
(Originally published in June 2019)

Ever wanted to smash a walking pumpkin with a Beyblade? Or wanted to destroy an amber pumkin with a ninja star, only to find yourself covered by toxic gas?

If your answer is yes, then why? That's really specific. But this game won't disappoint if that is the case. Otherwise, it might.

Smash your way through 7 themed levels and reach victory in the story mode, or try to get a high-score in the freeplay mode! Choose from the various blades, pick a color, and let it rip!

But be careful, not every pumpkin is friendly...
